src/SyncthingTemplar/SyncthingTemplar.cs.description: Main Blazor project file targeting .NET 9.0 with MudBlazor 8.* package. Uses Web SDK for Blazor Server.

src/SyncthingTemplar/Program.cs.description: Blazor Server entry point with MudBlazor. Uses AddRazorComponents().AddInteractiveServerComponents() for interactive SSR, AddMudServices() for MudBlazor, and MapRazorComponents<App>().AddInteractiveServerRenderMode() for routing.

src/SyncthingTemplar/appsettings.json.description: Standard ASP.NET Core configuration with Logging (Info default, Warning for ASP.NET Core) and AllowedHosts. Will need appsettings.Development.json for development-specific settings in future tasks.

src/SyncthingTemplar/Components/App.razo.description: Root Blazor component defining HTML document structure. Includes MudBlazor CSS (fonts.googleapis.com, MudBlazor.min.css), HeadOutlet for dynamic head content, Routes component in body, and JavaScript files (blazor.web.js, MudBlazor.min.js).

src/SyncthingTemplar/Components/Routes.r.description: Blazor Router configuration. Uses typeof(Program).Assembly for route discovery, Layout.MainLayout as default layout, RouteView for found routes, FocusOnNavigate for accessibility, and LayoutView with error message for NotFound.
